item.description: Join us for dinner and drinks at Papa Razzi restaurant in Framingham. We will have a nice relaxing evening enjoying good food and socializing. Each members pays for their own food/drink. Look forward to seeing you for a fun night!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a night of delicious Italian food, drinks and good company!
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at Papa Razzi Restaurant, Framingham
